snippet.title: Albert Wilde: Quantum P.I. Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Looking for something a bit different?
Become a hard-bitten cat detective in ‘Albert Wilde: Quantum P.I.’  

Coming on STEAM @ 24th January 2025
Rebranding the title to Cat Detective Albert Wilde
Demo here: Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810670/Albert_Wilde_Quantum_PI/  

TITLE: Albert Wilde: The Quantum P.I.  [now Cat Detective Albert Wilde]

A freakish corpse… a pissed-off bookie… a wormhole to another reality… it’s just another day in the office for Albert Wilde, feline private eye. In a striking black-and-white vision of the 1930’s, players must muddle their way through a murder mystery that’s messier than a fresh hairball, with a captivating voice-over and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!).  

Albert Wilde: The Quantum P.I. is a comedy game, a genre-bending noirish sci-fi mystery set in a fictional version of New York in the 1930’s featuring atmospheric black & white vintage visuals, and loveable anthropomorphic characters.

FEATURING:
- Vintage visuals inspired by 1930’s cinema: 4:3 aspect ratio, black and white colours, and a world of light and shadow
- A lighthearted genre-bending mystery from the team behind relaxing puzzler ‘Reky’, written with the support from renowned narrative design company Talespinners.
- Navigate different dialogue options, and peel back the layers of a mind-bending mystery.
- Loveable anthropomorphic characters of all stripes, brought to life with collage animation and non-human “voice” acting.
- A captivating voice over and atmospheric music, to get you right into the noir mood!

Credits: beyondthosehills
Discord: https://beyondthosehills/com/discord
Web site: https://beyondthosehills.com/quantum-pi/
